archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0504
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to link and manage my eSIM number to my wearable device, so I can use my wearable as a secondary phone if I want

properties.value: Is there an external eSIM provider or is it hosted by VF? What is the process of eSIM profile generation? There is an external eSIM provider. What information will be received in Diameter sessions (is MSISDN always there?)? To be checked by VF. It is.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
